definition: forced labor/corvée/obligatory task/military service/to use as servant/to enserf/servant (old)/war/campaign/battle
Huaihai Campaign (Nov 1948-Jan 1949), one of the three major campaigns by the People's Liberation Army near the end of the Chinese Civil War, considered the determining battle of the war
Liaoshen Campaign (Sep-Nov 1948), the first of the three major campaigns by the People's Liberation Army near the end of the Chinese Civil War
Pingjin Campaign (Nov 1948-Jan 1949), one of the three major campaigns by the People's Liberation Army near the end of the Chinese Civil War
Battle of Mt Mengliang in Shandong of 1947 between the Nationalists and Communists

Battle of Stalingrad (1942-1943), decisive battle of Second World War and one of the bloodiest battles in history, when the Germans failed to take Stalingrad, were then trapped and destroyed by Soviet forces
pinyin: Si1 da4 lin2 ge2 le4 Zhan4 yi4

definition: battle of Guadalcanal of late 1942, the turning point of the war in the Pacific
pinyin: Gua1 da2 ka3 na4 er3 zhan4 yi4

sentences.english: Another example is the blood donation campaign.
sentences.chinese: 另一個例子是捐血戰役。

sentences.english: Who fought at the Battle of Verdun in 1916?
sentences.chinese: 誰參加了1916年的凡爾登戰役？

sentences.english: The painter depicted Napoleon at the Battle of Waterloo.
sentences.chinese: 畫家描繪了滑鐵盧戰役中的拿破崙。

sentences.english: That "if" is big enough to imply this is a battle lost.
sentences.chinese: 那個“如果”大得足以暗指這一次輸掉的戰役了。

sentences.english: Adopt matter element theory to analyze validity of Yiwa battle command.
sentences.chinese: 利用物元分析方法分析宜瓦戰役的指揮決策過程。

sentences.english: Will we ever win the war on cancer?
sentences.chinese: 我們究竟能不能贏得抗癌戰役？

sentences.english: The building is a commemoration of the battle of Waterloo.
sentences.chinese: 這座房子是滑鐵盧戰役紀念館。

sentences.english: There is also a tutorial campaign featuring the Chosokabe clan.
sentences.chinese: 也有使用長宗我部家的教學戰役。

sentences.english: Added a countdown timer to campaign mission start.
sentences.chinese: 爲戰役開始版面增設倒時器。

sentences.english: After a long campaign, the Duke of Willington's army defeated Napoleon.
sentences.chinese: 經過長長的戰役，威靈頓公爵的軍隊戰勝了拿破崙。

sentences.english: There was considerable discrepancy between the two accounts of the battle.
sentences.chinese: 兩份關於那次戰役的報道大有出入。

sentences.english: Most of the fighting in the Korean War took place along the geographic line known as the thirty-eighth parallel.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮戰爭中，大多戰役發生在人們所熟知的三八線上。

sentences.english: The plan for this operation was coded "Overlord".
A bisexualg basebisexualngl battle was going on during the First World War.
sentences.chinese: 第一次世界大戰期間，一場大戰役正在舉辦。

sentences.english: This campaign would be known as Sherman's March to the Sea.
sentences.chinese: 這次戰役就是著名的“謝爾曼向海洋進軍”。

sentences.english: Battle goes until the indicator of health in one of the sides falls to zero.
sentences.chinese: 通過每一個單獨的戰役，戰至一方生命指數爲零爲止。
